'''''Kannazuka Battle Plan''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. This achievement is earned during ''[[Sakura Arborism]].''

==Trivia==
* The name {{Lang|"Kannazuka Battle Plan"|zh=神无冢作战计划}} is possibly a reference to the {{Lang|"Yashima Battle Plan"|zh=屋岛作战计划}} in ''{{w|Neon Genesis Evangelion}}''.
